weight: Approx. 290g (Battery and Memory Stick Duo are included)
lenstype: ZEISS Vario-Sonnar T* Lens, 10 elements in 9 groups (9 aspheric elements including AA lens)
batterytype: Maximum Voltage 4.2V, Nominal Voltage 3.6V, Capacity for Shooting 4.5Wh(1240mAh)
selftimer: Off/ 10sec./ 2sec./ 3 or 5 consecutive shots with 10sec. delay selectable
autofocus: W: Approx. 5cm to Infinity, T: Approx.30cm to Infinity
focallength: f=25.5 - 74mm(SteadyShot Standard), f=30 - 86mm(SteadyShot Active), f=33.5 - 95mm(SteadyShot -Intelligent Active)
imagestablizer: (Still image) Optical SteadyShot, (Movie) Optical SteadyShot Intelligent Active Mode, Optical type with electronic compensation, Anti Rolling type
minimumshutterspeed: iAuto(4" - 1/2000)/ Program Auto(1" - 1/2000)/ Manual(Bulb, 30" - 1/2000)/ Aperture Priority(8" - 1/2000)/ Shutter Priority(30" - 1/2000)*4
flashmodes: Auto/ Flash On/ Slow Synchro/ Rear Sync/ Flash Off
builtinflash: ISO Auto: Approx. 0.4m to 10.2m(W)/Approx. 0.4m to 6.5m(T), ISO12800: up to Approx. 20.4m(W)/Approx. 13.0m(T)
